Package GameLogic

Class GamePlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameLogic.GamePlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISubject
    public class GamePlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubject
    This Class maintains the state of the game and current player. The methods of this class are called by Controller. This class has singleton implementation.

      • exchangeCards

        public boolean exchangeCards​(java.lang.Integer cardNumber1,
                             java.lang.Integer cardNumber2,
                             java.lang.Integer cardNumber3)
        This method is used to perform the exchange cards function
        Parameters:
        cardNumber1 - The integer number of the first card
        cardNumber2 - The integer number of the second card
        cardNumber3 - The integer number of the third card
        Returns:
        true(If the method executes and cards are exchanged successfully) or false(Cards entered are duplicate or can not be exchanged or if any other validation fails)

      • ignoreExchangeCards

        public boolean ignoreExchangeCards()
        Fortify none Function used to cover the function of the player not wanting to exchange the cards
        Returns:
        true(If the player does not want to exchange cards and is allowed to do so) or false(If the player has more than 5 cards)

      • reinforceArmy

        public boolean reinforceArmy​(java.lang.String countryName,
                             java.lang.Integer numberOfArmies)
        Reinforce Army Function
        Parameters:
        countryName - The name of the country that is to be reinforced
        numberOfArmies - The number of armies that are to be reinforced
        Returns:
        true(If the player succeeds in reinforcing their armies) or false(If the countries are not adjacent or the country does not belong to the player or if any other validation fails)
